author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, Qualcomm, Disney, 21st Century Fox, Chevron, Johnson & Johnson, Starbucks - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Tuesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Down 0.4%: South Korean technology publication Electronic Times reported that Apple will use OLED screens in new iPhone models planned for 2019. Apple currently uses LCD screens in its phones. Shares of , which makes OLED screens, Italy's Political Turmoil Hits U.S. Markets Next Brexit & Beyond: Eurozone Crisis Fears Revived
